arts.ttl: Hansi Flick confirms injured Barcelona star ‘could return’ against Monaco
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick has on Saturday confirmed the imminent return to action of a sidelined member of his squad. The player in question? Ansu Fati. Wide-man Ansu was…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI vs Auxerre: Jordan Teze and Lamine Camara set to start
arts.sum: Monaco will be hoping to get back to winning ways as they host newly-promoted Auxerre at the Stade Louis II on Saturday evening. Before the international break, Les Monégasques were…

arts.ttl: Kassoum Ouattara admits AS Monaco already ‘thinking’ about Barcelona encounter
arts.sum: Ahead of the game against AJ Auxerre on Saturday, AS Monaco's Kassoum Ouattara (19) has admitted that he is "already thinking" about next Thursday's UEFA Champions League encounter against Barcelona, even if both he and his manager, Adi Hutter, insist that the club's full focus is on their upcoming Ligue 1 encounter.
